item.title: Starting a Blog
item.author: Author
item.description: Hello reader and welcome to my website. I spent a big chunk of today exploring the world of web development and one of my conclusions is that relearning something can feel like you’re learning something for the first time. Granted, a lot of the things I learned today about web development I had only known about by name. If you guys don’t know yet, you can host your own static website on platforms like Netlify and GitHub Pages for free.
